```{r}
project_production <- function(x, n = 10000) {
  s <- map(x, ~ sample(., n, replace = T))
  out = vector()
  for (i in 1:n) {
    out[i] <- sum(unlist(lapply(s, `[[`, i)))
  }
  out
}
```
